name: Felicia Dobrina
coverLetter: While I do not have any professional experience trimming I do have some casual experience helping friends trim pounds, ounces, etc. and am eager to learn any proper, appropriate techniques as I am a very fast learner. Most of my professional experience is in the veterinary world which speaks to my ability to work well in a fast paced, high stakes environment and quickly adapt to any situation at hand. I do believe I am worth training as I am a very reliable, responsible, flexible, and organized worker.
